featured.text: When not in use, the hinges allowed the two pieces of wood to fold back up tightly against the cabinet, where they were held in place by magnets.

definition.zh_def: 一種能夠吸引鐵或其他磁性材料的物體，通常由鐵氧體或其他磁性材料製成。
definition.en_def: An object that produces a magnetic field and can attract iron or other magnetic materials, typically made from ferromagnetic materials.
definition.example: The magnet stuck to the refrigerator door.
